story_28_09000/2401_1001_0100_10: Master Lear! Big news, big news!
story_28_09000/2401_1001_0200_10:
We’re getting reports from all over Pasio.
Sounds like folks are OK with postponing the
match until tomorrow.
story_28_09000/2401_1001_0300_10:
In return, they say they want us to make it the
greatest battle ever!
story_28_09000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I mean, of course! That’s exactly the response I
was expecting! I’ll show them the greatest battle
they’ve ever seen!
story_28_09000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Pasio, you’d better be so excited, you don’t get
even a wink of sleep tonight!
story_28_09000/2401_1001_0900_10:
He’s changed somehow, hasn’t he. Still as
self-important as ever, though.
story_28_09000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Yeah. I actually realized something about Lear
when we were battling together.
story_28_09000/2401_1001_1100_10:
He’s gotten so much stronger that I hardly even
recognize his battle style anymore.
story_28_09000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Indeed. He’s grown a lot. What we’re seeing now
is Lear’s true strength.
story_28_09000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Are you confident you can beat this new-and-
improved Lear, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_28_09000/2401_0401_1500_10:
A bold answer. I’m looking forward to
tomorrow’s match.
story_28_09000/2401_0302_1600_10: I don’t know, but I’ll do my best!
story_28_09000/2401_0402_1700_10:
And that’s perfectly fine. Battle your heart out
with no regrets!
story_28_09000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Let’s give it our best shot tomorrow! Our battle
with Lear is gonna be one for the history books!
